title: I’m Bringing My Ultimate Photography Crash Course to NYC
description: I’m super-excited to be speaking at the BILD Expo in New York City next month (produced by the folks at B&H Photo), and I’ve got something really cool lined up the day before it all starts: as part of their pre-expo programming, I’m teaching my 2025 Ultimate Photography Crash Course — live and in person. It’s a full day of the most helpful stuff I’ve learned over the years. It’s going to be an incredible day, so if you’re going to BILD or just happen to be in the NYC area, I’d love for you to join me. Where: The Javits Center, NYC When: Monday, June 16th — Doors open at 9:00am EDT You can get more details & grab your ticket here: https://kel.by/UPCC2025 The post I’m Bringing My Ultimate Photography Crash Course to NYC appeared first on Lightroom Killer Tips.
author: Scott Kelby

It’s a full day of the most helpful stuff I’ve learned over the years. It’s going to be an incredible day, so if you’re going to BILD or just happen to be in the NYC area, I’d love for you to join me. html:
I’m super-excited to be speaking at the BILD Expo in New York City next month (produced by the folks at B&H Photo), and I’ve got something really cool lined up the day before it all starts: as part of their pre-expo programming, I’m teaching my 2025 Ultimate Photography Crash Course — live and in person. It’s a full day of the most helpful stuff I’ve learned over the years.

It’s going to be an incredible day, so if you’re going to BILD or just happen to be in the NYC area, I’d love for you to join me.

Where: The Javits Center, NYC

When: Monday, June 16th — Doors open at 9:00am EDT

You can get more details & grab your ticket here: https://kel.by/UPCC2025
